amendment.description: An amendment to establish a mechanism which would generate automatic continuing resolutions whenever Congress and the President fail to enact regular Appropriations bills prior to the end of the Fiscal Year.

action.text: Mr. Lightfoot raised a point of order against the Gekas amendment (A011). Mr. Lightfoot stated that the amendment would change existing law and constitutes legislation on an Appropriations bill, in violation of House rules. The Chair sustained the point of order.
